Text: Yes if you read these 100 books you will have gotten fatter, worn out your reading chair, lost your friends, be pale from lack of sun and generally miserable discovering you could have lived your life instead of looking to someone else to tell you what you should do or think (sheeple).

I disagree Bob__dole, Some times someone needs an insight to spark that inner creativity which helps them see life and more important their own lives in a different perspective. You are a collective of events that occurred in your life and how you organized those events in your brain. Even you own senses can fool you as without your five senses there is really nothing ( NO THING) out there.
Naturally, no one is going to read all 100 books but one or two might be the ticket .

Bob_Dole, I'm sure you live your life to the fullest everyday right?

How about instead of all those video games, tv shows, and trashy movies you actually expand your mind with literature?

Not trying to be a dick, but if you can't read 100 books in a couple years there's something wrong with ya.
